titles.title: ACE Act
Allocating for Children's Education Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the contribution limit for Coverdell education savings accounts from $2,000 to $5,000, and for other purposes.
ACE Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Allocating for Children's Education Act or the ACE Act
Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to Coverdale education savings accounts, to: (1) increase from $2,000 to $5,000 the maximum allowable contribution to such accounts in a taxable year, and (2) allow distributions from such accounts for the purchase of athletic equipment at elementary and secondary schools.
